name: Slim Sword
description: Ddg+30, A light, unusually accurate sword.

name: Iron Sword
description: A standard sword made of iron─simple, but effective.

name: Steel Sword
description: A sword made of steel.

name: Silver Sword
description: An exceptional sword of rare metals.

name: Armorslayer
description: A sword made to penetrate heavy armor. Effective: Armored.

name: Killing Edge
description: A sword especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds.

name: Levin Sword
description: A magical sword that can strike close or at range.

name: Wo Dao
description: A sword honed to a razor edge.

name: Wyrmslayer
description: A sword crafted specifically to fight dragons. Effective: Dragon.

name: Brave Sword
description: A sword built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Libération
description: Divine Dragon only. Fills engage meter by 1 when user attacks and defeats a foe in a single turn.

name: Wille Glanz
description: Divine Dragon only. A powerful sword that can strike close or at range.

name: Caladbolg
description: A legendary sword, famous for its great power.

name: Iron Blade
description: A massive sword that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Steel Blade
description: A massive sword of steel that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Silver Blade
description: A massive sword of rare metals that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Georgios
description: A legendary blade that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Fólkvangr
description: Sword of Alfonse, prince of Askr. Grants Atk+3 for 1 turn if user has 50% HP or less at start of turn.

name: Biting Blade
description: Ddg+10, A sword with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user’s HP.

name: Slim Lance
description: Ddg+20, A light, unusually accurate lance.

name: Iron Lance
description: A standard lance made of iron─simple, but effective.

name: Steel Lance
description: A lance made of steel.

name: Silver Lance
description: An exceptional lance of rare metals.

name: Javelin
description: A light throwing lance that can strike close or at range.

name: Ridersbane
description: A lance designed for foes on horseback. Effective: Cavalry.

name: Killer Lance
description: A lance especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds.

name: Flame Lance
description: A magical lance that can strike close or at range.

name: Spear
description: A powerful throwing lance that can strike close or at range.

name: Brave Lance
description: A lance built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Brionac
description: A powerful lance of legend. Can strike close or at range.

name: Iron Greatlance
description: A massive lance that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Steel Greatlance
description: A massive lance of steel that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Silver Greatlance
description: A massive lance of rare metals that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Venomous
description: A lance of legend that smashes and poisons hit foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Représailles
description: Ddg+20, Battle lance that exudes an otherworldly air.

name: Fensalir
description: Lance of Sharena, princess of Askr. Inflicts Atk-2 for 1 turn on adjacent foes at the start of player phase.

name: Swirlance
description: Ddg+10, A lance with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user’s HP.

name: Compact Axe
description: Ddg+20, A light, unusually accurate axe.

description: A standard axe made of iron─simple, but effective.

name: Steel Axe
description: An axe made of steel.

name: Silver Axe
description: An exceptional axe of rare metals.

name: Hand Axe
description: A light throwing axe that can strike close or at range.

name: Hammer
description: A war hammer made to crack through heavy armor. Effective: Armored.

name: Poleaxe
description: An axe whose long handle helps reach mounted foes. Effective: Cavalry.

name: Killer Axe
description: An axe especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds.

name: Tomahawk
description: A powerful throwing axe that can strike close or at range.

name: Brave Axe
description: An axe built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Fragarach
description: A legendary axe.

name: Iron Greataxe
description: A massive axe that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Steel Greataxe
description: A massive axe of steel that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Silver Greataxe
description: A massive axe of rare metals that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Hurricane Axe
description: A magical axe that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat. Effective: Flying.

name: Ukonvasara
description: A huge, legendary axe that smashes foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Revanche
description: Battle axe that exudes an otherworldly air.

name: Nóatún
description: Axe of Anna, a commander in Askr. Grants Mov+1 for 1 turn when user has 40% HP or less at start of turn.

name: Lollichop
description: Ddg+10, An axe with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user’s HP.

name: Mini Bow
description: Ddg+20, An easy-to-use, short-range bow. Effective: Flying.

name: Iron Bow
description: A standard bow made of iron. Effective: Flying.

name: Steel Bow
description: A bow made of steel. Effective: Flying.

name: Silver Bow
description: An exceptional bow of rare metals. Effective: Flying.

name: Longbow
description: A bow made to fire at longer ranges. Effective: Flying.

name: Killer Bow
description: A bow especially well-suited to inflicting deadly wounds. Effective: Flying.

name: Radiant Bow
description: A magical bow whose arrows pierce with light. Effective: Flying.

name: Brave Bow
description: A bow built for expert wielders. If user initiates combat, attacks twice. Effective: Flying.

name: Lendabair
description: A bow wielded by legends. Effective: Flying.

name: Croissbow
description: Ddg+10, A bow with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user’s HP.

name: Master Bow
description: (Used during Emblem Leif’s Engage attack)

name: Short Knife
description: Ddg+20, An easy-to-use throwing knife. Poisons hit foes.

name: Iron Dagger
description: A standard throwing knife. Poisons hit foes.

name: Steel Dagger
description: A throwing knife made of steel. Poisons hit foes.

name: Silver Dagger
description: A throwing knife made of rare metals. Poisons hit foes.

name: Kard
description: A fighting knife intended for close combat. Poisons hit foes.

name: Stiletto
description: A fighting knife intended for close combat. Poisons hit foes.

name: Peshkatz
description: A fighting knife intended for close combat. Poisons hit foes.

name: Misericorde
description: Veyle only. An enchanted throwing knife that inflicts magic damage and poisons hit foes.

name: Cinquedea
description: A legendary throwing knife that poisons hit foes.

name: Carnwenhan
description: A legendary short sword. Smashes and poisons hit foes. Cannot follow up, or strike first if initiating combat.

name: Confectioknife
description: Ddg+10, A knife with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user’s HP.

name: Surge
description: A basic attack tome that can only be used in close combat.

name: Fire
description: A standard tome of fire magic.

name: Thunder
description: A standard tome of thunder magic. Cannot follow up.

name: Wind
description: A standard tome of wind magic. Effective: Flying.

name: Elsurge
description: An advanced attack tome that can only be used in close combat.

name: Elfire
description: An advanced fire tome.

name: Elthunder
description: An advanced thunder tome. Cannot follow up.

name: Elwind
description: An advanced wind tome. Effective: Flying.

name: Bolganone
description: A truly mighty fire tome.

name: Thoron
description: A truly mighty thunder tome. Cannot follow up.

name: Excalibur
description: A truly mighty wind tome. Effective: Flying.

name: Nova
description: An extremely potent tome. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Meteor
description: A tome of long-range attack magic. Cannot be used at shorter ranges.

name: Obscurité
description: Fell Dragon only. Truly mighty dark magic.

name: Tiramistorm
description: Ddg+10, A tome with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user’s HP.

name: Initiate Art
description: Ddg+30, A scroll of a fundamental martial skill. As a basic text, it does not attack twice.

name: Iron-Body Art
description: A scroll of a basic martial skill. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Steel-Hand Art
description: A scroll of a standard martial skill. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Silver-Spirit Art
description: A scroll of a highly polished martial skill. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Shielding Art
description: A scroll of a defensive martial skill. Grants Def+5.

name: Flashing Fist Art
description: A scroll of brash martial skill. Grants Spd+5, but user takes +5 damage. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Divine Fist Art
description: A scroll of a legendary martial skill. If user initiates combat, attacks twice.

name: Scrollcake
description: Ddg+10, A martial skill scroll with a sweet scent. Disappears when consumed as an item, but recovers user’s HP.
